select reserve_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reserve(reserve_no, stay_people, reserve_price, check_in, check_out, member_no, owner_no) values(#{reserveNo}, #{stayPeople}, #{reservePrice}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{memberNo}, #{ownerNo})
mapper.update: update reserve set stay_people=#{stayPeople}, reserve_price=#{reservePrice}, check_in=#{checkIn}, check_out=#{checkOut} where member_no=#{memberNo} and reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
mapper.delete: delete from reserve where reserve_no=#{reserveNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select owner_no from reserve where reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
